pr_title: feat(TDI-44873) : cve - bump olingo odata to 4.7.1 - maintenance

timeline.bodyText: why remove the verison of the jar?
timeline.author: jzhao-talend
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -27881,24 +27881,24 @@
                 MVN="mvn:org.talend.libraries/oauth2-oidc-sdk-4.5/6.4.0"
                 REQUIRED_IF="(((AUTH_TYPE=='ONLINE') AND (API_VERSION=='API_2016_ODATA' OR API_VERSION=='API_2018_ODATA')) OR ((AUTH_TYPE=='ON_PREMISE') AND (MS_CRM_VERSION == 'CRM_2016' OR MS_CRM_VERSION == 'CRM_2018')))" />
             <IMPORT
-                NAME="odata-client-core-4.3.0-patch"
-                MODULE="odata-client-core-4.3.0-patch.jar"
-                MVN="mvn:org.talend.libraries/odata-client-core-4.3.0-patch/6.4.0"
+                NAME="odata-client-core"
+                MODULE="odata-client-core.jar"

replies.bodyText:
The name of the artifact was 'odata-client-core-4.3.0-patch' as studio workaround no ? the given version was 6.4.0.
Now we want the real version of the jar whic is 4.7.1 version.
Am I wrong ?
replies.author: ypiel-talend

replies.bodyText:
i think MODULE should be the jar name with version.
and yes now the GAV should be used offical one.
replies.author: jzhao-talend

replies.bodyText: I added version to MODULE attributes.
replies.author: ypiel-talend

timeline.message: feat(TDI-44873) : add version to odata MODULE
feat(TDI-44873) : add version to odata IMPORT name
